articles.value: The Best Free White Spells for Commander
articles.excerpt: Everyone loves free stuff. So let's take a look at the best white spells in Magic that you can cast for free in Commander.

articles.excerpt: "This week's Plot Twist decklist is simply enchanting" - every aristocrat ever. See what weird old auras Jeff is sacrificing!
Formerly the only male Angel in Magic: The Gathering and now the only Angel with rampage in his text box, try this Gabriel Angelfire Commander deck!
